DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy rosuvastatin Korean dyslipidemia patient hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Crestor RUSH ( The Efficacy RosUvaStatin Korean Dyslipidemia Patients With Hypertension )
DOC.criteria: Hyperlipidemia patient prescribe rosuvastatin 10mg , base clinical ground fulfil follow criterion 1 . Over 18 year age 2 . Currently previously diagnose hypertension receive medical care 1 . Patients already take hyperlipidemic agent 2 . Patients fulfil indication criterion statin therapy 3 . Patients baseline and/or followup lipid data verify efficacy data
